website_summaries.verdict: Interested in buying a steamer but not sure if you want to start out with an expensive one? This is a great unit that is unbelievably inexpensive.
pros: Inexpensive, warms up water quickly, and is very quiet
In other words, this is a great starter unit that is also portable
cons: Slight smell reported during first couple of uses

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT, I lit fell inlove at first sight with it, It works perfectly and looks like a great quality or material. I ordered it in light pick and the color is lovely... It really cleans and moisturizes your face. It came with a cute tie so you can maintain your hair back. It's the perfect size! Not loud or messy! The steam is hot but didn't burn my face. GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome
customer_reviews.text: In Short: I loved it as my wife loved it and would definitely recommend others to buy the same too. Here's why... - Light weight & Portable - Quick and easy way to set up - Helps good in cleansing and moisturizing the face - Starts up fast - Very Effective - Feels fresh after - Eases minor congestion too
customer_reviews.author: Sagar

customer_reviews.title: Clogged pores be gone
customer_reviews.text: was told by my aesthetician to get on accutane for my clogged pores. ive been using this product for about a week and have not had any new pimples since ive used it (for my skin this is record-breaking). My skin looks clearer and feels more soft. I like to drop tea tree oil in mine to get an kick out of it. very relaxing having your own mini spa in your own bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: Clears pores/rebalances skin
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have tried countless products and methods to get rid of my clogged pores and acne which I’ve struggled with for over a year. I’ve used this steamer 4 times in the span of almost 2 weeks and my skin is bump free. I’ve used it in conjunction with the Aztec clay mask twice which was also helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: To start, the design is very simple and beautiful. I love the "bubble" shape of this steamer, it's so cute! There is only one button on this steamer that simply turns it off or on and it runs for 10 minutes on a full tank of water. Fairly easy to use, and the steam feels incredibly nice on my skin, there is absolutely no irritation or the steam being "too hot", in my opinion it was just the perfect temperature. The instructions were easy to follow upon setting it up and I was able to do a facial for myself in no time! (: Highly recommend this product~!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great, comes with charger and water droper to fill. Exact size as other profesional models. Looks exactly like image.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely nothing to say nad about about this little gadget I bought today. I bought this for clearing my sinuses like the doctor said but I was not going to spend a $100 at Walgreens, but this little gadget was cheap and as simple as filling the water with a bottled water or distilled water then plugging it in and turning it on and less than 4 seconds later you have steam. Buy this today.
customer_reviews.author: KCAT

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I purchased to replace 40 year old facial steamer and I love the improvements over the years. I use this for medical purposes - my doctor recommended to use after surgery and forever. Bonus - my skin is so soft and I think a few wrinkles are disappearing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy and helpful especially when it's really humid or hot and dry
customer_reviews.author: grisela

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! I haven't noticed a big improvement in my complexion but it does refresh you on a long night out.
customer_reviews.author: SAZ

customer_reviews.title: Initially I Liked this product.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I liked this product.. after started using it for 15 minutes and then I noticed that water tank got broken due to heat. I didn’t expect that with 15 minutes of use this product will get damaged
customer_reviews.author: Ramdinesh

customer_reviews.title: It's just "alright"
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I feel about this thing. So it works and it creates a lot of steam. I put a towel over my head and the steamer and it feels extremely relaxing. It opens up my pores and hydrates my skin nicely. So, it smells weird. Kind of a weird plastic smell. It gets a little better with every use, but not by much. That weirdos me out a little. Also I was moving it the other day and there was a ton of rust inside that spilled out into my sink. So I guess maybe I didn't empty it out and let it dry properly after using it? The quality is questionable, but it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Must have in facial routine
customer_reviews.text: I been using this little steamer for the past 11 months. I haven't had any issues since i bought it. Its just wonderful. The little shape of it is so cute but its also the size makes it easier to put it away anywhere. I love using it twice a week when I do I deep clean on my face to open up all my pores. I would so recommend this to anyone. Its a nice incorporation to your cleaning skin routing and it's supper affordable.
customer_reviews.author: KARINA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, not sure what to put inside to mosirizing skin better, anyone has better recommendations?
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Mold in the water canister
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and there was mold in the water canister! I was able to wash it out but this product was suppose to be new. Potential buyers be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Good to look at only.
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful product aesthetically speaking but functionally not so good. I've used it 3 times, it felt ok for the first time but later I started smelling plastic. It's as if we are inhaling a plastic mist. I did give a positive review initially but the nasty plastic smell is making me revisit my review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper!!

customer_reviews.title: It is a waste.
customer_reviews.text: The water tank broke after 2nd use. It is a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Had to change the water container 3 times in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The water container gets broken every two times and I use distilled water. I think it's made in a plastic that doesn't support the heat... Bad quality product
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Good facial steamer.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome steamer. Bought a nano steamer, different company, and it broke right away. This steamer is great.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Fossum

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but I feel cheated bc I didn’t receive the very same replacement facial mist that was broken. . This one is smaller so did I really get what I paid for? If it’s smaller, it should’ve been cheaper. Besides, I have to put my face down lower to meet the mist explosive. THAT’S DISSAPOINTING!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware
customer_reviews.text: Use this facial steamer with caution. I purchased this facial steamer a week ago. It has been working well until I used it a second time and it started to leak out this brown foul smelling liquid. I followed the directions before the first use and added some lemon juice in water it to flush it out, but I guess it needs to be done a few more times. After flushing it two more times the brown liquid stopped coming out. Hopefully that will be the last ot any issues I have with it. Other than that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Well done product
customer_reviews.text: Its a great thing- helps sooth during cold as well as acts a dual facial steamer and humidifier. Its looks nice but delicate and is functioning nicely though I have had it for a short while so will not be able to comment on its durability. It has an auto shut off, and one session lasts not more than 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: sz

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: Had less then a year and just stopped working. I used it about once a month sometimes more.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Product broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to use this product only to find out I could no longer use it due to plastic container breaking. Very disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Small but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It’s small like the description said.. nano. It does spray a little water hare and there when it’s on but very little. It gets the job done since I’ve been doing my own facials. I never times how long it lasts but I never had to refill while I’m doing a facial.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Works great! No issues. Great value
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Exactly what we were hoping for. My daughter uses this followed by the handheld suction vac and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mmnnaiv

customer_reviews.title: My favorite part of my week now. Improvement in my skin.
customer_reviews.text: It's now my favorite part of my week. I never knew how relaxing steaming my face would be. It also feels great knowing I'm clearing out my pores or prepping my face for my serums/oils/moisturizers. I've also noticed an improvement in my skin. Would buy again if it ever broke! I never had any of the issues I saw from negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Zero star if I could give. Broke after 5 uses!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect simple steamer !
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this facial steamer. It’s the perfect size to keep on my vanity and use to help clear my sinuses and help my acne. I am a singer and during the winter months it’s important for me to keep high humidity. I’ve also been researching all the benefits of facial steaming and love using it. I am so happy i found this product !
customer_reviews.author: ReviewLO

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: works great. Love it!! Doesn't get too hot. Lasts just long enough and what's recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BumbleBee

customer_reviews.title: But others then that l like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it but some times the prouduct can get really hot 🤪
customer_reviews.author: Tyrese hall

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: This is EXCELLENT and works well for opening the face. Not too hot either. We have also used this in the Cold Weather to help with our Asthma issues. When the cold hits us, it hurts our lungs, even after using our rescue inhaler. We used this by inhaling the steam and it helped our lungs tremendously. I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Eric Banda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Water capsule broke after 5th time using it :( If the water component wasn't so flimsy, this would be a great product.

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt hold a ton of water but does the job

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely diffuses the water you put in it, and overall great, it does exactly what is advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Good

Only bad thing is that it does leak a the bottom a tiny bit but that's normal it says it on the instructions that it might happen. Overall good for its purpose I use it to open up my pores before a face mask or before I apply my serum.

customer_reviews.title: Bad items

customer_reviews.text: Is easy to manage, clean your face in short time and help you breathing better too

customer_reviews.title: Moist, dewy face within minutes!
customer_reviews.text: It heats up really fast and gets pretty hot. My face gets wet and dewy within 2 minutes of use. Very good product, does exactly what it says, I’m very satisfied with my steamer.

customer_reviews.title: Worth to buy
customer_reviews.text: My friend and me share this mini steamer. He used for his dry eye and it works well. I used for my facial exfoliation. It also works perfect. It heart very fast and simple to use.

customer_reviews.title: Really like this one
customer_reviews.text: Works very well works very similar to a high end one I own and use. Gives out lots and consistent steam. Steam is not too hot follow instructions on package. Looks nice too.

customer_reviews.title: Easily use, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Easily use, great quality! This is the one what I was looking for, and it's pink! The size is perfect and shape is match with my dressing table.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all. It barely releases steam. You’ll get more steam from a quick shower than this device.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome product! It produces a lot of steam and opens up your pours very fast! love it

customer_reviews.title: Product could be dangerous and I'm glad I was sitting there when it happened
customer_reviews.text: Save your money! Used for 2 days and the water well broke into 3 pieces. Product could be dangerous and I'm glad I was sitting there when it happened. So disappointed and have no idea how this could have such good reviews!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for travel
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, perfect for travel!!! I use it for my face, and was pleasantly surprised at how well it worked!!!! Very satisfied.

customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item last month. After using 3 times, the plastic water container broke even though I didn't drop. It just cracked from left to right.

customer_reviews.title: It worked really good up until the back part broke in less than ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked really good up until the back part broke in less than a year. They don't even have replacement parts for it and not that it is my fault. it just fell apart on its own. I really loved this steamer but disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Nice!

customer_reviews.text: I really like this facial steamer because it’s so easy to use and compact ! You just fill it up, kick it on, and steam! I’ve only used it for a few days but I can definitely tell that it’s a new staple in my skincare routine.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very dry. When I use this, my skin is very watery.

customer_reviews.title: Good nano mister
customer_reviews.text: I loves it! Doesn't need to be charged long, it's perfect for on the go. If you are always in dry environments and office spaces you'll love this. Emits cold vapors good for dry skin.

customer_reviews.title: If you’re thinking about it. Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! At first I was having doubts because it was really cheap compared to other brands but it works really great and makes your skin feel amazing!!!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for home facial
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product as facial steamer to help with removal of blackheads and pimples.

customer_reviews.text: I found it super weird how the package was delivered as is. Im gifting it to my friend but hopefully nothing was damaged

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend to everybody
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute and so convenient to carry with me wherever I go. Definitely recommend to everybody!

customer_reviews.title: This product is really convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is really convenient and easy to use. I am glad I can take care of my skin more often.

customer_reviews.title: Totally addicted to this steamer
customer_reviews.text: All i can say is excellent. I love the handle. I do something crazy, I tied a string around it and hang from my medicine cabinet so when I am washing my face the steam is blowing towards me. I love no bending over with towel over your face. The warm steam brings comfort to my skin, opens my pores and brings a beautiful healthy glow. Love this steamer. It gets the job done. Salon Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Baby BeeTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfortable! The temperature is also perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable! The temperature is also perfect. Not only my face but also my eyes feel comfortable~It's really good!!

customer_reviews.title: Kingdom Beauty Kingdom Cares Facial Mister
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking and cool concept. I love the cool mist when I’m hot or stressed.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! So easy to use and makes me skin feel great. Love this at home spa treatment :)
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer.
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is great. It starts releasing steam within 1 minute of turning it on, and has been great at steaming my face or even opening up sinuses! It is not very big so i can easily store it on the back of my toilet and it not be in the way. Definitely a great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S

customer_reviews.title: Container for water broke
customer_reviews.text: The holder for the water kinda broke the 2ndb time I used it. It leaks into the machine now. It feels amazing n it's handy. It still works, but not too happy for $25.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Swanson

customer_reviews.title: review it's been changed
customer_reviews.text: Noticed the difference in my face and feel very good. The biggest issue is that the steam is not strong or heavy I have to move my face around so is only going to impact 1/4 of your face. Also I used different brands of the recommended water and the water turns red with particles. I am not recommending this product. The part the product use to hold the water broke pretty easy so the water overflows and now I can't use it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is great and good to work with
customer_reviews.text: Save up and get a more professional one. This is a step up from just boiling water. Still works but use 1-2 times a month at most. Customer service is great and good to work with. Not a bad product but not all the hype. Mind you, the stars are for customer service, if not it'd be more a 3.
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctions after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This steamer worked very well for about 6 months. After that the cap that screws onto the water compartment became harder and harder to remove. I’m not sure why. Now I can barely open the water compartment to refill it because of how hard the cap is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best personal moisturizing face steamer
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product exactly what my wife was looking for. It produces the right amount of steam that moisturize the face and leaves the face refreshed and rejuvenated. She has also used it during facials which makes extractions of blackheads/whiteheads very easy and gives amazing results. In just few days of buying the product, it has become an essential part of her makeup kit and she use it twice a week to give her a fresh and young looking skin. And I love it too, highly recommended for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Smelly - sometimes it even smells like it's burning
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing a facial steamer. I have used it 3 times before writing a review. PROS: Steam is quick (30 sec-1 min for start up) Product is quiet Ease of use CONS: Smelly - sometimes it even smells like it's burning, and I'm not sure if that's my fault or if it's the product itself, but it makes me scared and I always turn it off a little early
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial steamer. I just wish the cord was a little longer. I also wish that it held more water to run more than 10 minutes, but given the size, it's understandable. And I like that its small.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this!! The steam was hotter than I thought it'd be but it doesn't bother me at all. And a lot of steam comes out! Still has a weird smell to it though even after the lemonaid thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful buy!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! After getting a facial a couple months back and being told the benefits of steam I knew I had to get one of these. I have looked at many and decided on this particular one. The packaging was great and the product itself is beautiful! My skin felt amazing afterwards. It has kind of become an addiction lol.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Works great and really blasts the steam out
customer_reviews.text: Works great and really blasts the steam out. I found it easy to fill the water and it last for as long as I need for a facial. I've had 2 of the other kind where the plastic piece fits more around your face, but the steam they put out is nothing compared to this. I am pleased with this facial steamer and glad I picked this one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Laskowski

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. The steam is quite powerful and I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Freesia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. I only wish the water capacity was more. The steams are very soothing
customer_reviews.author: Balasubramanian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this steamer three times since I bought it last week and I love it. I can already feel the difference with my skin. I am glad I purchased it.

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family member and they love it! It lets out a nice thick steam and switches off automatically when there is no water left in the tank. Amazing, well built product, very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Give it a shot!
customer_reviews.text: My friend suggested me to use facial steamer. I got it on prime day. It works fine. I suggest to use it before cleaning or mask. It worth the money!

customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product.my cotton ball turn black after I wiped my face . It kept my face clean and fresh.

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.text: This has saved my skin, I could not be happier.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this crap.
customer_reviews.text: ZERO stars. I’ve only used mine once 2 days ago (planned on steaming every other day). Woke up this morning to steam fir my sinuses and the water canister broke. No warnings like a crackling sound or anything. And I was pulling straight up to release it. If you’re thinking of buying the product, go with another facial steamer. Preferably one that doesn’t break for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and decided to get this one. As an esthetician, I believe that it works really well even with it's small size. The steam really covers your whole face and gets the job done. I used filtered water from my Britta and worked well with it. Keep in mind, that with its small size, that it will only work for 10 minutes at a time, but it starts up really quickly. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bernaline Soto

customer_reviews.title: Fast Steam - Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I would always boil water and set my face over it - what a pain. This is a perfect size and creates lots of steam within a minute. I can turn it off work on my face and steam again if needed. Love this!

customer_reviews.text: Worked really well the first handful of times that I used it, then then the container that holds the water fell apart so now it's completely worthless. Don't waste your money, unless you don't want to use it much.

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love❤️❤️❤️

I loved reading some of the other reviews, because there are so many other things it can be used for!! It's strange to say that it's cute, but it really is, it also has a little mirror in it, when you open it up!

customer_reviews.title: I loved the facial steamer until six weeks after using it ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the facial steamer until six weeks after using it the cap no longer fits onto the water reservoir. I can no longer use this and the 30 day return date has passed.

product_meta.title: KINGDOMCARES Hot Mist Facial Steamer Warm Nano Ionic Moisturizing Face Humidifier Personal Home Sauna SPA Unclogs Pores Blackheads Acne Comedone Removal Facial Hydration System Nano Sprayer Pink
product_meta.description:
Color:PinkFRETURES:
1.Compared to normal steam, Nano-ionic steam can penetrate the skin more easily. It is an effective way to moisturize facial skin, relieve dryness and provide your skin a relaxed, gentle and smooth condition.
2.A tepid and gentle temperature of the steamer can unclog pores, remove dirt, oil, keratin and leftovers. After a period for using, the symptoms of blackheads, fat granule and acne can be relieved significantly.
3.The steamer can generate full-powered steam under 50 Seconds, which make moisture replenishment is more effective.
4.The fashion design can complement your bathroom, makeup table, and dressing area easily. It comes in a premium quality gift box. High-quality gift for friends.

ATTENTION:
1. Before using the steamer for the first time, please let it run with a full tank of water with a few drops of lemonade for removing a bit of odor from manufacturing. 
2. When adding water, please gently pull out the water tank vertically from the back of the steamer, and then twist off the round lid at the bottom of the tank to fill water. 
3. The distance between the steamer and face should be 7-8" inches (20cm) when steaming. A full tank of water can be steamed for about 8~10 minutes. 
4.The proper and max water level is about 80ml. If the steam spays in a incontinuous way or the steam is not strong enough. Please refill the water tank.
5.Adjust the steaming angle for your convenience.The steam is in high temperature, to avoid burning, keep your face at least 25 cm (9.8in) away from the steam outlet.

SPECIFICATIONS: 
Product name: Warm Mist Facial Steamer
Model Number: KC-1330 
Rated Voltage: AC 110-120V
Rated Frequency: 60Hz
Power: 280W
feature_bullets: Home Sauna SPA System: The Nano ionic hot mist face sprayer is designed for skin moisturizing, it can provide you professional salon sauna spa at home, unclogs pores blackheads whitehead acne. Tiny Nano ionic steam penetrate skin and supplement moisture effectively, improving skin nutritional absorbency, relieve sinuses.

Automatic shut-off timer setting : Smart shut-off Features facial steamer shuts off automatically if there is no water in the water supply tank, preventing any injury. It can be used on normal, oily, dry, combination and sensitive skin types, helping skin recover to a tender younger and healthier condition.

Skin Cleaning: It is an effective way to moisturize facial skin, relieve dryness and provide your skin a relaxed, gentle and smooth condition. A tepid and gentle temperature of the steamer can unclog pores, remove dirt, oil, keratin and leftovers of makeup. After a period for using, the symptoms of blackheads, fat granule and acne can be relieved significantly.

2-in-1 Warm Steamer：This steamer is good for skin care, and can humidify room for ultimate refreshment. High-tech ozone function is provided to sterilize. A UV lamp sterilizes steam so that it can reach your skin with purest most effective condition.

Quick start-to-steam and High-end Design: It generates full-powered steam in under 30 seconds. The steamer can make moisture replenishment is more effective. You just need to fill water tank simply and turn on the steamer. Then allow skin to be cleansed, replenished and moisturized. The fashion design can complement your bathroom, makeup table, and dressing area easily. absorbency.
